pages.text: In this entry we will be going over $(h)Crystals$() and $(h)Shards$(). In dungeons you will be able to find $(h)pieces$() of different crystals: niazite, idlite, thalamite, diginite, blocite, grindite, turnite and soulite. You can craft 9 of these together to create a shard of the corresponding crystal.
You can combine nine shards together to create the Phat Crystal. This is used to purchase player upgrades and for some late game recipes.
